NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PHLOX: Spire, I had not heard you were constructing a new model here at the Crossroads! Could I ask what this fascinating new model is for? 2 1 SPIRE: Greetings, Phlox! This is a simulation of future meteor impacts from Hollow's Lantern (our dreaded volcanic moon) on Brittle Hollow, but.. 3 2 PHLOX: What? That sounds like incredible, Spire! 4 3 PHLOX: With forecasts from this model, we would be able to know precisely where any meteor impacts occur.. It would allow Nomai to safely traverse Brittle Hollow's surface without fear! 5 4 SPIRE: Yes, it would be a lovely idea! The only issue is... The model appears to be flawed. 6 5 SPIRE: Even with data from the negative time interval, a meteor impact calculated using the model was off by orders of magnitudes.. And I simply cannot figure out why. 7 6 PHLOX: How odd.. Have you brought this issue to our friends in the Hanging City? Perhaps they have ideas to improve the model's calculations. 8 7 PHLOX: I look forward to the day you perfect this model, my friend. Your models of Giant's Deep have already been so revolutionary for our clan! 9 8 SPIRE: How you flatter me, Phlox. You have my gratitude for your advice, my friend! 10 9 SPIRE: As I do not appear to be making progress on my own, I shall break from my fruitless work to seek advice from our friends at the Hanging City. Perhaps they will notice something I have overlooked! Workshop R3 8
